title: Complex Review
description: Workflows for multi-reviewer handoffs and layered approvals.

steps.title: Assign review team
steps.description: System assigns multiple reviewers with specialized scopes.
steps.narration: The orchestrator splits tasks across underwriting and compliance.

steps.title: Document deep-dive
steps.description: Each reviewer inspects different documents with AI highlights.
steps.narration: Teams cross-comment on flagged sections and share insights.

steps.title: Consensus meeting
steps.description: Reviewers evaluate risks, adjust conditions, and vote.
steps.narration: A consensus view forms around risk appetite and limits.

steps.title: Approval routing
steps.description: Routing engine escalates to senior decision authority.
steps.narration: Senior approver receives consolidated context and signs off.
